item.title: Domino Count
item.description: Howdy folks, Let me introduce Domino Count, a web app for keeping score of a game of dominoes. You can find the repo here. My goals with this project were: Frontend: Experiment with htmx and Tailwind CSS. The end result still looks terrible, but with classes :laughing: DevOps and infrastructure: Use Github Actions to deploy to Fly.io On the Go side of things, there were a few new things for me:
